sections: Ford made headlines when they announced the return of the Mach 1 name and again when they said that the car touted as the ultimate 5.0-liter track car was going to a limited production edition. How limited, they won’t say, but regardless, the 2021 Mach 1 is set to be an instant collectable.
As is the case with most

, getting your hands on one can be a task. Being one of the first to own one usually requires pre-ordering and when you throw manufacturing delays caused by COVID19 in the mix, this process gets even more lengthy and difficult. Now some lucky winner of this
giveaway is not going to have to worry about any of that thanks to USARK - Florida, and that lucky winner could be you.

is finished in Race Red and loaded to the brim with all of the features that come along with the Mach 1 package. Under the hood is a 480-horsepower 5.0-liter engine backed by a Tremec 6-Speed Manual Transmission with Rev Matching technology. Thanks to a sport tuned chassis, a MagneRide damping system, and the Mach 1 handling package, this Mustang is ready to outrun the competition. Adding to the already extreme capabilities Ford outfitted this car with an aerodynamics package that includes a performance rear spoiler with a gurney flap, and a front aero splitter.

Inside, Recaro seats add a mix of sport and luxury making this car just as suited for road use as it is for the track. Mike Del Zio, Ford’s Vehicle Dynamics Engineer describes the car as “the car we always envisioned in terms of the chassis and the aero. This is the car our team has wanted to build since S550 started.”  Don’t miss your chance to win this rare and stunning 2021 Mustang Mach 1. Enter to win by clicking
and making a generous donation. Oh and just for being a reader, Motorious readers get bonus entries. Enter today to win.
